problem_text_cn: 如图,斜坡AB的坡比1:1.5,BC⊥AC,若AC=6m,则BC的高度是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the slope ratio of slope AB is N_0:N_1, BC ⊥ AC, if AC = N_2, then the height of BC is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵BC⊥AC,∴∠C=90°,∴△ABC是直角三角形,在Rt△ABC中,∵i$=\frac{BC}{AC}=\frac{1}{1.5},且AC=6m,∴BC=i×AC$=\frac{1}{1.5}×$6=4(m),故选:A．
